name: Semantic Gradient Operator
intent: Provide directionality to semantic dynamics as the basis of agency.
algebraic\_properties: Inner product (∇U, ∇J) ≤ 0 if U decreases as J increases.
constraints: ∇U must be defined on a domain where semantic coherence J is also defined.
∇U must generate attractors that are consistent with agency as defined in the axiom box.
